hero.title: Build 10x Faster with Starter
hero.subtitle: Craft. Build. Ship Modern Websites With AI Support.

features.title: Effortless Task Management
features.description: Automate your tasks and workflows by connecting your favorite tools like Notion, Todoist, and more. AI-powered scheduling helps you stay on track and adapt to changing priorities.

marketing.title: Marketing Campaigns
marketing.description: Effortlessly plan and execute your marketing campaigns organized.

scheduler.title: AI Meeting Scheduler
scheduler.description: Effortlessly book and manage your meetings. Stay on top of your schedule.

features.testimonialQuote: Wow, auto-generated pages are the kind of thing that you don't even know you need until you see it. It's like an AI-native CRM.

testimonials.title: Loved by the Community
testimonials.subtitle: Harum quae dolore orrupti aut temporibus ariatur.

refundPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our product, you can request a refund within 30 days of your purchase.
refundPolicy.step1: To request a refund, please contact our support team with your order number and reason for the refund.
refundPolicy.step2: Refunds will be processed within 3-5 business days.
refundPolicy.step3: Please note that refunds are only available for new customers and are limited to one per customer.

cancelSubscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancelSubscription.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time by logging into your account and clicking on the cancel button.

upgradePlan.question: Can I upgrade my plan?
upgradePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time by logging into your account and selecting the plan you want to upgrade to.
upgradePlan.note1: You will be charged the difference in price between your current plan and the plan you are upgrading to.
upgradePlan.note2: Your new plan will take effect immediately and you will be billed at the new rate on your next billing cycle.

phoneSupport.question: Do you offer phone support?
phoneSupport.answer: We do not offer phone support at this time. However, you can contact us via email or live chat for any questions or concerns you may have.
